sn45.3:1: At Sāvatthī. Then the Venerable Sāriputta approached the Blessed One … and said to him:
sn45.3:2: "Good, good, Sāriputta! This is the entire holy life, Sāriputta, that is, good friendship, good companionship, good comradeship. When a bhikkhu has a good friend, a good companion, a good comrade, it is to be expected that he will develop and cultivate the Noble Eightfold Path.
